name: Grown Knight
description:
Important: This is a small prototype to test the use of Unity Analytics.

Grown Knight is a side scroller, set in a fantasy world made in pixel art.

It features music from argentinian bands in 8-bits.

Overcome all the enemies to face the final boss.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

J = Melee attack

K = Ranged attack

----------------------------------------------------------------

Importante: Este es un pequeño prototipo para testear el uso de Unity Analytics.

Grown Knight es un side scroller lateral, ambientado en un mundo de fantasía realizado en pixel art.

Presenta música de bandas argentinas en 8-bits.

Supera a todos los enemigos para enfrentarte al jefe final.

Controles:

WASD = Movimiento

J = Ataque melee

K = Ataque a rango
